Eritrean midwife granted refugee status in NZ after daring escape from prison, crossing desert and sea https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eritrean-midwife-granted-refugee-status-in-nz-after-daring-escape-from-prison-crossing-the-desert-and-sea/634QOCOSWNGF5FZFBXOMIM6AJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/eritrean-midwife-granted-refugee-status-in-nz-after-daring-escape-from-prison-crossing-the-desert-and-sea/634QOCOSWNGF5FZFBXOMIM6AJA/ Tracy NealHe was accused of helping a female prisoner escape hospital moments after she gave birth. Sat, 22 Feb 2025 01:00:00 +0000 A midwife who escaped prison in Eritrea after he was accused of helping a woman flee the country soon after she gave birth has been granted refugee status in New Zealand on appeal. Photo / 123RF
